description:
Upward Mobility presents its Advanced EMT Exam Prep Bundle app for Palm webOS!   With 1,000 questions based on the material on the NREMT I/85, I/99, and Paramedic, this app will rigorously prepare you for any advanced level emergency medical technician exam. All questions in our AEMT app are written exclusively for Upward Mobility by NREMT certified expert writers, with a thorough and up-to-date EMS knowledge.   *  This app pairs its questions with clear, thorough explanations to reinforce comprehension of the material, and to bridge the gap between your basic EMT knowledge and practical patient application. It covers all topics commonly found on Intermediate, Advanced, and Paramedic EMT Exams: 
Airway and Breathing, Ventilation and Respiration, Cardiology and Resuscitation, Trauma, Medical, Obstetrics, Gynecology and Pediatrics, and EMS Operations.   *  The intuitive Study Mode interface allows you to track your progress through the application and return to difficult questions during your review. Test mode allows you to take the course as a simulated AEMT exam and quickly review the questions and areas in which you may need extra help.   ||   Upward Mobility is not affiliated with nor is this app endorsed by the NREMT.   ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
